title: Kinda Funny Happy Hour (FREE PREVIEW EPISODE)
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

This show was part of our 9 year Kinda Funny Day anniversary stream! If you enjoy it, join us for this month's LIVE episode on Wednesday at 3PM PT! Get The Kinda Funny Membership on either  YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames or Patreon.com/KindaFunny to get our shows ad-free, watch live as we record them, and a daily exclusive show!
